mapper.select:
SELECT A.PANO_NO, A.MEM_NO, A.PANO_TITLE, A.PANO_LIKE, A.PANO_REGDATE, A.PANO_DAY_NO, A.PANO_DAY_DATE, A.PANO_DAY_LOCA, A.PANO_DAY_MEMO, B.MEM_NAME FROM ( SELECT
CEIL((ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.PANO_NO DESC))/8) RN,
CEIL((ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.PANO_NO ASC))/8) RN,
A.PANO_NO, A.MEM_NO, A.PANO_TITLE, A.PANO_LIKE, TO_CHAR(A.PANO_REGDATE, 'yyyy.mm.dd') PANO_REGDATE, B.PANO_DAY_NO, B.PANO_DAY_DATE, B.PANO_DAY_LOCA, B.PANO_DAY_MEMO FROM YJ_PANORAMA A, YJ_PANO_DAY B WHERE A.PANO_NO = B.PANO_NO AND B.PANO_DAY_DATE = 1 ) A, YJ_MEMBER B WHERE RN = #{currPage} AND A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO

SELECT A.RN, A.PLAN_NO, A.MEM_NO, A.PLAN_TITLE, A.PLAN_LIKE_CNT, A.CONTENTID, A.FIRSTIMAGE, A.PLACE_TITLE, B.MEM_NAME FROM (SELECT
CEIL((ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.PLAN_NO DESC))/8) RN,
CEIL((ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.PLAN_NO ASC))/8) RN,
A.PLAN_NO, A.MEM_NO, A.PLAN_TITLE, A.PLAN_LIKE_CNT, B.CONTENTID, B.FIRSTIMAGE, B.PLACE_TITLE FROM YJ_PLAN A, (SELECT A.CONTENTID, A.PLAN_NO, C.FIRSTIMAGE, C.TITLE PLACE_TITLE FROM YJ_PLAN_DAY A, (SELECT MIN(PLAN_DAY_NO) PLAN_DAY_NO FROM YJ_PLAN_DAY GROUP BY PLAN_NO) B, YJ_PLACE C WHERE A.PLAN_DAY_NO = B.PLAN_DAY_NO AND A.CONTENTID = C.CONTENTID) B WHERE A.PLAN_NO = B.PLAN_NO ) A, YJ_MEMBER B WHERE RN = #{currPage} AND A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO
